about_the_game:
Midnight Curse is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Blood Invention
  • Vampiric Action
  • Vox Wampira

Ambience
  • Haunted House

SFX
  • Magic Summon (4)
  • Mansion Door Close (4)
  • Mansion Door Open (4)
  • Wolf Howl (4)
  • Transform Bat to Human
  • Transofrm Human to Bat
  • Transform Human to Wolf (4)
  • Transform Wolf to Human (4)
  • Vampiric Minion (4)

  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
